# ENTITY::SET_ENTITY_VISIBLE

## Summary
Set if the ped is visible (i.e. rendered)

## Parameters
* **ENTITY_INDEX** entity
* **BOOL** visibleFlag
* **BOOL** resetRenderPhaseVisibilityMask = false

## Notes
resetRenderPhaseVisibilityMask is always false.
